name: TOY BOAT TOY BOAT TOY BOAT TOY BOAT
name_original: TOY BOAT TOY BOAT TOY BOAT TOY BOAT
description:
Play with a friend and use the radio signal to find your friends lost at sea! Higher pitched sounds indicate the right heading, and your radio beeps faster the closer you are.

By Jackie Markiewicz, Ibrahim Shahin, Wyatt Thomson, and Sam Yusim

For Peg Jam 2023.
